title: "Geometric Wallpapers"
content: Welcome to our website featuring a collection of stunning geometric wallpapers! Our monochromatic color palette and simple yet elegant repeating patterns of geometric shapes make for the perfect backdrop for any device. Whether you're looking to add a touch of sophistication to your phone, tablet, or desktop, we've got you covered. Browse through our selection and find the perfect wallpaper to match your style. With our easy-to-use download feature, you can have your new wallpaper up and running in no time. Upgrade your device's look today with our beautiful geometric wallpapers!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a repeating pattern of simple geometric shapes, in a monochromatic color palette such as grey or blue."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
